summary: This bill, the Renewable Natural Gas Incentive Act of 2025, amends the Internal Revenue Code to promote the use of renewable natural gas (RNG). It provides a tax credit of $1.00 per gallon equivalent for RNG sold for use as a fuel. The bill defines RNG, establishes rules for blended RNG, outlines certification requirements, and specifies a termination date of December 31, 2035. It also makes conforming amendments regarding registration and payments related to the credit and specifies the effective date of the changes.
